description: A commonly used fuel in internal combustion engines, derived from crude oil.
A type of fuel made from crude oil, primarily used in diesel engines.
A fuel source that uses electricity stored in batteries to power the vehicle's electric motor.

Liquefied petroleum gas, a clean-burning alternative to petrol or diesel for vehicles.
